ValidationRule.description: Fixed Assets will check to indicate Board Approval for CFR's over $10 Million
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
AND( OR( $RecordType.Id = "012E000000065Gq" /* Capital */, $RecordType.Id = "012E000000065Gr" /* Lease */ ),
$Profile.Name <> "CFR Fixed Assets"
&&ISPICKVAL(Status__c, "Spend in Progress"), NOT Board_Approved__c = TRUE, Total_CFR__c > 10000000 )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Fixed Assets will check to indicate Board Approval for CFR's over $10 Million
